original_text: One wing of the first cherub was five cubits long, and the other wing five cubits—ten cubits from wing tip to wing tip.
korean_text: 한 그룹의 이쪽 날개도 다섯 규빗이요 저쪽 날개도 다섯 규빗이니 이쪽 날개 끝으로부터 저쪽 날개 끝까지 십 규빗이며

sentences.original_text: One wing of the first cherub was five cubits long
sentences.korean_translation: 첫 번째 그룹의 한쪽 날개는 다섯 규빗 길이였고

sentences.original_text: and the other wing five cubits—
ten cubits from wing tip to wing tip
sentences.korean_translation: 날개 끝에서 날개 끝까지는 열 규빗이었다
